review_blob: My favorite to have with their "Purist Burger". Has a few spices and citrus undertones competing with each other, with a great semi-dry and hoppy finish.
A light maltiness, smooth and flat taste, and a medium body which finishes extremely clean.
My personal favorite of all of Old Forges beers. Goes well with any of their food offerings, especially meats. Hoppy, medium-bodied, medium bitterness, great finish.
The lightest hop of Old Forge IPAs, with a medium body. It finishes quick, with medium bitterness.
As a resident hop-head, this is one of my favorite regional India/imperial pale ales. A bit expensive in my vicinity in relation to other great local craft beers, but evidently worth it.
